decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | No part of the vehicular access shall be within a distance of 1.5 metres from the base of the adjoining street tree.  REASON:  In the interests of preserving and maintaining the street tree in the long term and, thereby not giving rise to conditions prejudicial to local visual amenity. | The area beneath the spread of the branches of the tree to be retained as shown on the approved drawings shall not be used for the storage of building materials, plant, machinery or other items, or for vehicular access or for the burning of materials of any kind.  REASON:	To prevent damage to the tree in the interest of the visual character and appearance of the area.
description: Formation of vehicular access to classified road
